name: @codex-native/sdk
description: Native NAPI-based Codex SDK - complete standalone implementation.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist *.node npm target/release/*.node && cargo clean --release
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf dist *.node npm target node_modules && cargo clean
scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:napi && npm run build:ts && npm run verify:build
scripts.build:rust: cargo fmt && cargo clippy --release --features napi-bindings -- -D warnings
scripts.verify:build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const hasNode=fs.readdirSync('.').some(f=>f.endsWith('.node'));const hasDist=fs.existsSync('dist/index.mjs')&&fs.existsSync('dist/index.d.ts');if(!hasNode||!hasDist){console.error('Build incomplete: missing .node or dist files');process.exit(1)}console.log('âœ“ Build verification passed')"
scripts.pretest: npm run build:napi && npm run build:ts
scripts.lint: cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy --release --features napi-bindings -- -D warnings && npm run typecheck
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test && npm run publish:platforms && node scripts/publish-sdk.mjs
scripts.release:dry: npm run build && npm run test && npm publish --dry-run
